sentences.en: A: Will you give me your camera? We have to confiscate your film.
sentences.cn: 你的相机给我好 吗 ?否则我就要没收你的底片了.

sentences.en: Confiscate laptops , Blackberrys all corporate phones and storage devices of terminated employees.
sentences.cn: 回收已离职员工的笔记本、存储设备等.

sentences.en: Did the teacher confiscate your toy?
sentences.cn: 老师没收你的玩具了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He confronted their leader and threatened to have the authorities confiscate their equipment.
sentences.cn: 他劈头盖脸就威胁那边的带头人,要让当局没收他们的器材.

sentences.en: Internal Revenue Service: you confiscate the parachute along with their luggage, wallet, and gold fillings.
sentences.cn: 国税局的 ︰ 除降落伞外,把他们的行李 、 钱包和金饰品也一起没收.

sentences.en: Make maximum use of legislation to confiscate the proceeds of drug trafficking.
sentences.cn: 善用现行法律以充公贩毒得益.

sentences.en: Many opposition supporters had their goods confiscated.
sentences.cn: 许多反对党支持者的财产被充公了。

sentences.en: Miss Williams confiscated all our sweets.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯老师没收了我们所有的糖果。

sentences.en: No entity or individual shall confiscate or detain any motor vehicle plate.
sentences.cn: 任何单位和个人不得收缴、扣留机动车号牌.

sentences.en: The copyright administrative authorities may confiscate their illegal income or impose a fine on them.
sentences.cn: 由著作权行政管理部门给予没收非法所得、罚款等行政处分.

sentences.en: The police have the right to confiscate any forbidden objects they find.
sentences.cn: 如发现违禁货物,警方有权查扣.

sentences.en: There is concern that police use the law to confiscate assets from people who have committed minor offences.
sentences.cn: 有人担心警方利用该法罚没犯下轻罪的人的财产。

sentences.en: To seize ( property ) by force or authority; confiscate.
sentences.cn: 用武力或权势夺取 ( 财产 ); 充公.

sentences.en: We have to confiscate your cat.
We'll have to confiscate this object.
You are not supposed to bring fresh fruits into China. I'm going to confiscate them.
sentences.cn: 鲜果不能带入中国, 我们将予以没收.

trans.tran_cn: 没收, 充公, 查抄, 征用
trans.tran_en: to officially take private property away from someone, usually as a punishment
to officially take private property away from someone, usually as a punishment
